citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm May 14,
2025. USDA arrived at the gate which was closed, to avoid blocking the gate USDA proceeded to a location down the
road and attempted to make contact by phone. With no answer USDA was able to leave a message. A second contact
number was provided and called but the voicemail had not been set up so a text message was sent. At 2:40 pm after no
response USDA left the area.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm May 14, 
2025. USDA arrived at the gate which was closed, to avoid blocking the gate USDA proceeded to a location down the 
road and attempted to make contact by phone. With no answer USDA was able to leave a message. A second contact 
number was provided and called but the voicemail had not been set up so a text message was sent. At 2:40 pm after no 
response USDA left the area.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
